sentences.sContent: I wanna save you, save you, save you tonight.
sentences.sContent_eng: I wanna save you, save you, save you tonight.
sentences.sCn: 我想要拯救你，拯救你，拯救你就在今晚。

sentences.sContent: Am I the one you wanna place in your heart – why me ?
sentences.sContent_eng: Am I the one you wanna place in your heart – why me ?
sentences.sCn: 我是你想要放在心上的人吗？为什么是我？
